description.raw:
These will be similar to the `-ci-default-` and release branch jobs.

Jobs generated here:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_ignition/635/

A few are already passing:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_cmake-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_msgs-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/

but some aren't

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_math-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64&build=1)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_math-ci-gz11-bionic-amd64/1/

I'll start looking into the failing builds, though I might save that for separate pull requests if it is too complicated.
